content: wicked wildlings - hexpaw - cat materials 4 5mm hook worsted weight yarn in two colors - main color mc & contrasting color cc embroidery floss or crochet thread in black or a color that will show over mc/cc for x eye nose & stitching one button for second eye felt or fabric for heart & eye patch i realized after taking the picture that i forgot to add his little heart but i think he looks just as cute without it
